title: 830. Thomas Davis on His Playing Days with Luke Kuechly & the LB Position
itunes:title: 830. Thomas Davis on His Playing Days with Luke Kuechly & the LB Position
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode of Move the Sticks with former NFL linebacker Thomas Davis as a guest. Throughout the show, Davis discusses what made former teammate Luke Kuechly special, playing multiple positions before his NFL career, what to do to be a successful linebacker, what his experience was like playing for Ron Rivera and John Fox, and much more.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
